title: Fashion Takes Planning......?
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Ara, your outfit looks great today, Shioriko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Thank you. I bought these on a shopping trip with Ayumu-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, it’s nice to see that you chose a knit top with exposed shoulders, Shioriko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I thought I’d catch a cold wearing a knit top that exposes my shoulders... But I remembered you and Ai-san explained how to cover up when necessary, so I tried to do that. When I’m outside, I wear a coat and a shawl. When I’m indoors where it’s warm, I’m fine, so it’s just a matter of adjusting for the temperature outside!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>That’s great. Fashion takes planning 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Um, I know that knee-high boots look good with shorts. And Ai-san said that it’d also protect you from the cold, but my thighs are cold. What should I do......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Do you still feel cold even if you wear tights?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>A bit......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Endure it then, if it’s just a bit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Alright. Fashion takes planning and a bit of endurance. I get it now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
